title: What is the average cost of getting a new broadband internet connection in a city? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tariff depends on your usage, speed requiremnet etc. For home usage , for mail checking, fb etc BSNL BB plan on optical fibre starts from 599 per month( FUP 4gb per day at 10mbps speed, beyond that 2mbps ,unlimited calls) . On copper start up pack Rs.299 per month( upto 20mbps speed till 50 GB , after that 1mbps, unlimited calls).
